name: openhab.google-assistant-smarthome
description: A Google Assistant, Actions on Google based implementation for openHAB
author: Mehmet Arziman

scripts.release-major: cd functions && npm --no-git-tag-version version major && git add package*.json && cd .. && npm version major -f -m ":bookmark: Release (major): %s"
scripts.release-minor: cd functions && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && git add package*.json && cd .. && npm version minor -f -m ":bookmark: Release (minor): %s"
scripts.release-patch: cd functions && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add package*.json && cd .. && npm version patch -f -m ":bookmark: Release (patch): %s"
